title: Evolution of Federated Learning: Comparative Study of Visual/Auditory Conditioning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Learners possess intermediate or higher competencies in mathematical modeling and experimental data analysis, with prior experience using online collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners can compare three major theoretical models that explain the developmental stages of associative learning
Learners can analyze visual/auditory conditioning experiment data using mathematical statistical models (t-test, ANOVA)
Learners can derive an exponential function explaining age-related differences in associative learning ability and apply it to experimental results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
